name: Knowledge Domain
description: Clerics of knowledge value learning and truth above all.

1.name: Blessings of Knowledge
1.description: Learn two languages and gain proficiency in two skills of your choice from Arcana, History, Nature, or Religion. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for checks with those skills.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Knowledge of the Ages
2.description: Use Channel Divinity to gain proficiency in any skill or tool for 10 minutes.

6.name: Channel Divinity: Read Thoughts
6.description: Read the surface thoughts of a creature within 60 feet. You can end the effect to cast suggestion without a spell slot and the target automatically fails its save.

8.name: Potent Spellcasting
8.description: Add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with cleric cantrips.

17.name: Visions of the Past
17.description: Meditate to receive dreamlike glimpses of past events related to an object you hold or your current surroundings.

choices.name: Knowledge Domain Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Knowledge Domain subclass
